posts.post_title: FS (price reduced) -  Orval Overall Portrait P150 - SGC 4
posts.post_content: For sale (Price reduced) - Orval Overall Portrait, P150 - SGC 4. $275 venmo no fee or $285 pp gs. Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.5% to agreed upon price to cover ST.
